thread.title: Bruce Lee tamil audio launch date confirmed
thread.title_full: Bruce Lee tamil audio launch date confirmed - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Bruce Lee tamil audio launch date confirmed
text: Ram Charan's most eagerly awaited action entertainer, Bruce Lee has wrapped up its final shooting schedule. The film is gearing up for a grand release on October 16. The film will be releasing in Tamil as Bruce Lee 2 on October 16, along with the Telugu version. According to sources, Bruce Lee 2 will have its audio launch on October 7 in Chennai. Reputed Tamil distributor Bhadrakali Prasad of Bhadrakali Films will be releasing the Tamil version. Composed by SS Thaman, the Telugu version's audio was released on October 2 and it has been declared a huge hit.
